message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.AI

The paper deals with analyzing monocular footage to understand object arrangements and human-object interactions in physical spaces. This involves computer vision (CV) techniques such as detecting 2D human joint positions and scene layout analysis (GR). The paper also proposes a global optimization approach, which falls under robotics (RO) and machine learning (MM) categories. Finally, the approach is data-driven, which suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (AI) techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV and cs.GR, followed by cs.RO, cs.MM, and cs.AI.
